description: Developed the open-source Clarifai Node.js SDK, enabling seamless integration of the Clarifai platform with various JavaScript frameworks. Collaborated closely with the Developer Experience team to optimize and enhance the adoption journey for developers integrating Clarifai into their projects.

Built open source client side SDKs for Svelte, Relay, expo & swr to integrate the WunderGraph Gateway with frontend code. Played a significant role in the creation of Open Previews (https://www.openpreviews.com/), an open source alternative to vercel's preview comment feature.

Was the founding lead engineer of the OSlash chrome extension. Led the development of the OSlash chrome extension using an in-house framework built with webpack. Managed engineering teams and implemented serverless GraphQL federation with edge caching, authorization, and rate-limiting.
Mentored students, graduates, and professionals on full-stack development, focusing on Node.js, Express, React.js & MySQL. Helped several students land software engineering jobs.
Developed the Pickyourtrail mobile app (Android & iOS) using React Native. Integrated TypeScript into the web app and contributed to tech communities. The mobile app received 5 stars on Google Play.
Built and delivered two cross-platform mobile apps in React Native. Developed a Windows app on UWP using a React.js-based framework.

Interned to learn PHP with CodeIgniter-based web application development. Later converted to a full-time role. Worked on full-stack application development using PHP and MySQL. Built APIs and helped modernize the development stack with Node.js. Led a team to adopt React.js, React Native, Laravel, and Node.js across various projects. Contributed to Node.js, Laravel, and React.js projects.
